Subject: Comic and Graphic Novel Writing
Description: Writing for comics, graphic novels, and other sequential art forms is different from short story writing. Come learn the tricks of the trade.  Speakers include:BluRaven Houvener, Trico Lutkins, Chris Thomasma - Track: Webcomics, Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
